Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=7.5µg/ml)
